column1: See instructions for details on how to complete this template
column5: When did the relevant benefit crystallisation event take place? (XX/XX/XXXX)
column6: What was the type of relevant benefit crystallisation event? (see instructions)
column7: What was the total of the relevant benefit crystallisation event? (£)
column8: Does the member hold valid protection or enhancements for the relevant benefit crystallisation event? (YES/NO)
column9: IF NO TO H, GO TO COL. R
column10: Were any other protections or enhancements relied upon for the relevant benefit crystallisation event?
column11: For non-residence enhancement, what is the unique reference?
column12: For pension credits from previously crystallised rights enhancement, what is the unique reference?
column13: For pre-commencement pension credits enhancement, what is the unique reference?
column14: For recognised overseas pension scheme transfer enhancement, what is the unique reference?
column15: Was scheme specific lump sum protection relied upon?
column16: Are any other protections or enhancements held for the member’s relevant benefit crystallisation event?
column17: IF ANSWER TO COL. P: What is the associated reference for the member’s protections or enhancements?
column18: Has this lump sum payment taken the member over their available lump sum allowance? (YES/NO)
column19: IF NO TO COL. R: Has this lump sum payment taken the member over their available lump sum and death benefit allowance? (YES/NO)
column20: IF NO TO COL. S. JOURNEY ENDS
column21: Has the excess been taxed at a marginal rate for this member? (YES/NO)
column22: What is the employer PAYE reference used to report the excess for this member?
